article.title: American Science and Engineering Receives $67.1 Million Government Order for ZBV Military Trailers
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: American Science and Engineering (AS&E) has received a $67.1 million order from the U.S. government for a significant quantity of ZBV military trailers. The ZBV military trailer will be deployed by the U.S. government for counterterrorism applications in harsh environments.
